content: Hi! How can I assist you today?
I’m interested in your platform. Can you tell me how the plans work?
Sure! Everyone can sign up for free with basic limits: 1 domain, 10 contacts, and 50 emails per month.
What if I need more than that?
We offer Premium and Unlimited plans. Premium increases limits to 5 domains, 30 contacts, and 80 emails. Unlimited removes all caps.
Can I customize the chatbot to fit my team’s needs?
Absolutely. You can customize responses, manage domains, and adjust chatbot settings easily from the dashboard.
Does it support automating customer onboarding and FAQs?
Yes, our chatbot can handle onboarding flows, answer FAQs, and escalate to human agents when needed.
Great! How about integrations with email and CRM systems?
We integrate with popular email providers and CRMs. You can sync contacts and trigger campaigns directly.
Nice. Is there a way to try it before committing?
You can start with the free plan anytime. If you need more, upgrading is simple and instant.
Sounds good. How do I sign up?
Just visit konvo.app/sign-up, create your account, and start setting up your chatbot.
Thanks for the info! Who can I contact if I need help?
Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email. You can also access detailed docs and tutorials in your dashboard.
Awesome! Let me know if you have any questions along the way.
